title: 函数参数顺序
desc:
### 题目描述
给定一个函数，请给函数传入正确的参数，完成函数调用


### 输入描述
函数需要几个参数，则有几个输入


### 输出描述
打印函数返回值


### 测试样例

#### 样例1: 输入-输出

```
Alice,first
```

```
Hello , Alice! This is your first practice
```
templateCode:
def test(num,name):
    print('Hello , %s锛乀his is your %s practice'%(name,num))
sourceCode:
def test(num,name):
    print('Hello , %s! This is your %s practice'%(name,num))
name,num=input().split(',')
test(num,name)

testCases.output: Hello , Alice! This is your first practice
Hello , Mike! This is your second practice
